issue.title: [JS] Support custom_metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1032](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1032). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support [field-level](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Schema.fbs#L250) and [schema-level](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Schema.fbs#L286) custom metadata

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1032?focusedCommentId=16238441) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/527af63cde4ac1df53e82d6f8ced064738f5c1a3
